website_summaries.verdict: Provides the support your dogs need with recycled materials you can feel good about.
pros: Made from recycled materials, this crate mat is both soft and firm: effectively providing dogs with comfort and support
Removable mat cover is machine washable and available in a range of colors
Bed provides effective relief for dogs with bone and joint pain
cons: Mat sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: if it didn't hold onto residue so bad. After a week or two
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5, if it didn't hold onto residue so bad. After a week or two, I don want to run my hand over the soft fur. It holds onto wetness and peepee. Can't throw it in the washing machine. Tried to wipe it and dry, but it's still feels a little grimey. Maybe better for older and clean dogs- not a puppy with moppy peepee feet. EDIT: It does have a zip to throw it in the wash, but it's hard to get back onto the foam square. And it still feels like sticky peepee.
customer_reviews.author: KenTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit my my small dog crate and the dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit my my small dog crate and the dogs seem to like it too! They will not leave the crate now (How i prefer it to be) UPDATE: Still a great product, BUT I've noticed that the furry material comes out with use. There's blue fuzz all around the cage on the carpet that has to be vacuumed up!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: This is the second crate pet bed purchased and I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.text: My last American Kennel Club pet bed held up very well while being put through its paces by a busy little mimi-schnauzer. She performed her circle dance before settling into sleep very day and the pad held together just fine. Sure, the furry cover could be a bit denser, but we have had no bare spots to contend with. I ordered a second pad only because the gutters overflowed and my garage flooded. The pad got wet and was going to take many winter days to dry out. I ordered a new pad to avoid risking mold of any kind as the result of slow drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good cushion
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my Silky and Yorkie. The Silky chewed thru the cover and began pulling the stuffing out. So mad. The Yorkie loves hers. Its firm yet comfortable looking. I did have a small issue when trying to clean it. There was an accident and i went to wash the cover and it was hell getting it back on. The recycled cushion crumbled a bit trying to get it back in the cover. Overall its a decent cushion though. As long as your dog isn't set out to discover whats inside.
customer_reviews.author: TeressaW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Junk, not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The covering pills fuzz off, not durable, very thin. The so called orthopedic foam is shredded and lightly glued pieces with a 1/4 inch top foam. This is not a solid sheet of memory foam. My 50 pound dog got one night out of it. She came out of her crate with fuzz all over her from the cover, and I pulled it out and noticed lumps. I unzipped the cover and all the recycled pieces had come part, NOT from chewing but just from her doing her 3 circles before she lays down. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Carla S. Dekalb

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if your dog is a digger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 98lb great dane pitbull mix's kennel for while I'm at work. Lasted maybe a month until the fuzzy exterior material started to make it's way out of the kennel due to my dog digging trying to get comfortable. The cover stayed intact, no holes so 5 stars on that. The pad however had a massive bowl in the middle. Yes I know it is my dogs fault for the damage but it tells me he didn't like it because it wasn't comfortable. I personally wouldn't buy it again but don't regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keigan

customer_reviews.title: Throws fuzzy mess everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad! Bought 2 of these in black about 6 months ago and didn't get them out for use until the last few weeks ago. It looks like someone killed a skunk in my living room and I have an elderly 8 lb chihuahua who only lays on it occasionally- nothing rough or any chewing. Its been too long to send back I am sure. Going to see it I can replace the covers. I really don't appreciate having to spend $$ for that. THANKS A LOT. BOOO!
customer_reviews.author: tomturbo2000

customer_reviews.title: Great crate mat
customer_reviews.text: Great crate mat. Firm yet comfortable filling. My dog is a morky, weighing 13 pounds. / zippered cover is very nice feature. Have washed the cover twice, using cold water and delicate cycle. Held up very well in wash. / suggestion: if your pet occasionally soils bedding, try enclosing foam inner cushion in standard 13 gallon trash bag, so you will only need to wash the cover.
customer_reviews.author: kathyg

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for older dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our pug is getting older and has hip dysplasia. Vet told us to get her orthopedic beds. This one fits in her kennel stand crate, for our RV when we travel. She loves it, and gets up quicker and seems to hurt less after using it. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Palumbo

customer_reviews.title: Nice crate pad
customer_reviews.text: The cover is awful - it sheds, as others have mentioned. I cover my beds with waterproof crib sheets so it doesn't matter to me what the cover is like. The mat itself is just right for my 36 inch crate - it fits perfectly & the mat is firm & has really nice support for my 35 lb dog. This mat isn't too thick, and isn't too thin, & it doesn't cost a fortune like big barker and other name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Dogs

customer_reviews.title: I shop on amazon all the time- buy this bed, it’s legit good thick foam bed
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how many reviews I’ve read and how long I tried to find a good price on crate bed with memory foam! So many dog beds in general are too thin and a joke. This is sturdy and thick foam, I bought this for my 13lb dog and it’s great so far. I shop on amazon a lot and read reviews before purchase. Get this bed, you will be so happy you did. I want my dogs comfortable and give them the best I can afford, glad I chose this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Thick Bed
customer_reviews.text: This mat was perfect for what I was looking for. I needed a bed to sit atop an antique chest for our kitties to enjoy. They previously had flatter beds that did not seem comfortable, so I was looking for a thicker pad to soften it up. This is great and blends in so it doesn't look like a giant cat bed in the middle of our living room. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not lasting if your dog digs or scratches
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed geeat, I bought two for both crates and our puppy started heading into her crate more and more on her own. At about 8 months old, though, she started scratching/digging, especially right before laying down. This bed is not made to hold up to that. She quickly tore a couple of small holes in the top. As she keeps scratching she has been shredding the pad inside and little bits come out through the holes. It is practically just fabric left in the middle now and I will be replacing them with something that is more scratch-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.  Tiny bit too large for 24" crate. REVISED
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. A wee big for a standard 24" kennel, but when inserted it leaves a slight roll on one edge which ends up working good for a lean in/snuggle side. I topped with a rolled edge thinner crate mat and some loose fleece blankets. Dog when in on his own to hang. Very happy. Both dogs slept great through the night. Makes very cozy dens now. UPDATED: I bought another one for a day crate size to potty train. THIS IS NOT FOR POTTY TRAINING. Doesn't not wash well at all. Cover does not prevent urine/moisture from getting into the foam. I washed the whole thing double rinse and it still smelled.
customer_reviews.author: AudK

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: SO SOFT! This is my second bed. I bought one a year ago in the green color and it still looks brand new. I've adopted a senior dog since then, and my two dogs always want to sleep on this bed over all the others we have. This fits perfect inside a crate. It holds it shape, but also sinks just under the dogs' bodies while they rest on it.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenC

customer_reviews.title: soft
customer_reviews.text: super cute, fits in my dog crate and he loves it. he has not tried to chew it. I went toi wash it and when i un zipped it the contents seemed lose like they would fall out so I just lysoled and wiped it down, unsure how to wash and per other reviews im scared to actually wash it in the washing machine, other then that I love this bed for my dog
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, not very practical...
customer_reviews.text: To carry the AKC label you would expect better quality, but in this instance the old saying "you get what you pay for" is clearly apropos. Luckily I hadn't anticipated long term use, so wasn't terribly disappointed, but I had thought it was going to be machine washable, as it states in the blurb, but it is NOT. It was advertised as 24 x 19 and was actually 22. Anything involving animals, needs to be machine washable. If you are ok with spot cleaning, high likelihood of holes in the cover, and short term use, then this may work for you. Otherwise, look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Made out of carpet padding rebond
customer_reviews.text: I removed the cover to wash this bed and was shocked that it’s made from the cheapest form of carpet padding, rebond, which is left over process of padding blended together so that it can be easily pulled apart. I can pull pieces of it off the cushion. If you plan to ever clean this, I’d advise against getting it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne B

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best Crate Pad I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I received This Crate Pad. It was a 4-inch thick orthopedic foam pad. It fit into my crate (35"x22") perfectly. All other crate pads I have found at Walmart, Petco or Petsmart have been 2" and twice as expensive. I will buy this again when I need to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ailina 25

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit in my extra large Vari-Kennel. Nicely padded for comfort. Very attractive as a chew toy, however. Lasted three days, then puppy couldn't resist and completely destroyed it, unfortunately ingesting quite a bit of foam filler before we caught him. Would love to see this with a seriously chew-resistant cover.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: ... when I saw the other reviews but I really like how it's held up
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about the quality of this bed when I saw the other reviews but I really like how it's held up. I should say that my dog is a burrower so I keep a blanket on all of his beds so that he burrows into his blankets instead of the bed. He also seems to love and sleeps on it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Salio

customer_reviews.title: VERY QUESTIONABLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This item is not nearly as nice as expected. The material is very weak. There were also two areas where there was no stitching at all along the seam. That's actually how I discovered that the material is so weak - when I started trying to stitch it (attempting to avoid returning the item at more cost to the seller, etc.) the material fell apart so I had to stitch it way into the fabric so that the edges wouldn't disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: MrsMurphy

customer_reviews.title: Buddy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I unzipped it and looked inside and there was a second covering in there and the reason it had two covers on it is because the cover inside had a broken zipper. I was not very impressed because of the two covers but I thought I'd give it a try anyway and let my puppy lay on it. My puppy is actually 13 years old and he has a hard time getting in and out of my bed but now since I bought him this he prefers to lay on his bed and not in my bed it was definitely worth the money. The very first night he was laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: DeenaKay

customer_reviews.title: I am not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: This is lovely and I bought it for my very large dog's crate. However, it never occurred to me that it's NOT MACHINE WASHABLE!!! A pet item that you cannot wash????? I went to wash it and looked at the label for instructions as to water temps, etc. It says "SPOT CLEAN". Arggggghhhh! What will happen is that I will have to sew a cover for the comfy pad by myself, and that was part of the reason I bought the pad in the first place---so that I would not have to craft one myself!! I am not a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, like velvet
customer_reviews.text: Super soft, like velvet. Dog loves it. We purchased one earlier that my dog chew apart quickly, so if you have a digger, this might not be your best bet. Now that our dog is older and isn't so misbehaved, he does great. Often prefers this to our bed, which is great cause now we have more room!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Faeder

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion for crate
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome in my crates and my older dogs really like them. I do have a digger so we replace them every year or two but they still seem to last longer than the others we’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Kandi Buchwald

customer_reviews.title: Pretty low quality- she wasn't actively trying to damage it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a major fail for me and my dogs. I am giving it 3 stars because I know my dog is part of the problem, but I can't imagine she is totally abnormal. She likes to 'dig' her bed when she circles before sitting, and this thing tore within the week. Pretty low quality- she wasn't actively trying to damage it or play with it, she was just doing her 'get cozy' routine.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful bed! My elderly beagle loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bed! My elderly beagle loves it. She sleeps so soundly when she lays on it. I would really recommend to anyone to purchase this. Orthopedic dog beds are great for elderly dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!!️
customer_reviews.text: Tried to take the cover off to wash and the foam on the inside was falling apart. It looked like scrap pieces glued together with egg crate foam on the top. Tried to put foam back inside the cover and it was so squeezed in that the zipper popped and broke. I was so frustrated that I trashed the cover and the broken pieces of foam and just shoved what was left of the cushion into a pillow case. Definitely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this bed! It was comfortable for her and she enjoyed it right up until the time we left her home alone for a couple of hours too long and she tore it to pieces. But if your dog is not a chewer, this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AKC knows what you need for your dogs, and thank you AMAZON for carrying this item
customer_reviews.text: AKC knows what you need for dog. Outstanding product for your dog. I found one of these in a department store, but they only had one that fit my dog crates. I have two dogs and use the same size crate so I wanted a second one as they both needed new dog beds for their crates. I kept going back to the department store in hopes that they got another one in that I could purchase, but they never did. I decided to try to find it on Amazon instead. I was very happy that you were able to get me another one and in the size I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great! It's not filled with fluff so it won't flatten out in a month. The cover is very soft and hair comes off of it very easily! All I have to do is run my hand along the surface of the bed and the hair just lifts right up. I've purchased several of these beds: one for my dog's crate, one for our living room and another for her crate at my parents house. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not made well as it’s like partial foam and will indent your dogs body in no time. I returned before I used as this is the same material I’ve bought previous. You must get a REAL memory foam bed to last.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Porras

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality insert
customer_reviews.text: If your dog scratches (fluffs) the bed or is inclined to chew a little, then forget this bed. The insert looks like recycled material poorly glued together. It doesn't take much for it to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: randy

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal! I've ordered ones online ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal! I've ordered ones online before that were cheaply made imitations with a flimsy piece of foam inside. These are thick and well made. My dog that has achy joints loves it!
customer_reviews.author: lsmcnair

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it...
customer_reviews.text: My dog immediately took to this bed upon placing in her crate. Very thick and comfortable for her. The cover is easy to clean and is definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little senior dog
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a crate pad for my 14 year old dog. He seems extra comfortable! The cover zips off easily for washing. I'm planning to get more for the other dogs' crates as well!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Sidny Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Shredding apart in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: I just received these a couple of days ago, and the fuzzy cover is already completely shredding apart. Pretty disappointing for AKC. Anybody else have this problem? It’s awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Whippet

customer_reviews.title: I like this bed
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed. It is very firm and has a nice fleecy cover. My dog, however, doesn't seem to care for it much. He will lay on it from time to time, but I think it is too firm for him, plus makes him too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Pad
customer_reviews.text: wow this is sturdy, feels great. the material looks like it will be easy to de-hair.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I have an arthritic dog who loves this mattress. It fits well inside my pet gear crate.
customer_reviews.author: debby young

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold up when washed.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it, however I washed it & the cover fell apart. Just plan on using it & throwing it in the trash & save yourself the trouble of having to clean out the "fur" from the cover, from your washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G

customer_reviews.title: Foam filling is cheap, stinks, and crumbled into pieces after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The cover is nice and soft, and the bed is a perfect size for my crate. These are the only positive qualities. It is very lumpy (so don't expect to put a bowl on it) and the filling is extremely cheap. The cheap foam interior also absorbs odor rapidly. I started noticing a smell from the bed, and found it to be the foam interior. Unfortunately the foam at this point (after only a few weeks of ownership) had completely crumbled apart and had to be thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Best crate mat ever. Wanted to get a more supporting kennel pad for my aging poocherini after her last one started losing the fluff. Did some research and chose this one. My dog loves it. It provides firm support but is also soft and comfy. I love how well this kennel pad is made and ended up buying a large one for my moms aging German shepherd as well. Great product. 5 star review for sure
customer_reviews.author: psalm harper

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if your dog gets their bed really dirty
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS NOT MACHINE WASHABLE. When my sister-in-law washed it in the washing machine on delicate after our senior family dog peed on it, the foam inside is absolutely destroyed, making the bed so unuseable that it had to be thrown out. The tag itself says spot clean, which is not very helpful towards dogs who have accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but fabric leaves fuzz balls everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our small dog crate, looks good, seems very comfy for the dog. Only problem is that the soft fuzzy fabric leaves fuzz balls everywhere. I can’t imagine it’ll hold up to washing. I’ll probably just start using a pillowcase over it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura2928

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. It is well made and seems very durable. I have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Only problem is the dogs like to dig around before laying down and a lot of the fluff comes off. The dogs don’t seem to mind but the floors gets messy for the first week or two.
customer_reviews.author: ali5223

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for a recovering dog!
customer_reviews.text: I use this cushion in the back seat of my car for my recovering dog. It is very stable and comfortable. It looks great.
customer_reviews.author: N. DeVito

customer_reviews.title: Not for dogs that dig.
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted all of five minutes with my phone still not before she had dug a hole in it. If your dog at the digger like mine I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: tonya hass

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk a little and washed I did not dry it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Greimann

customer_reviews.title: Dogs do not approve.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The grey color is actually blue. Very firm cushion and soft cover, which seems like it would be good for my dogs. However, neither dog will lie on it. Coco and Dot, the "consumers," give it zero stars. Irritated that I have to pay shipping to return and doubly irked that I unknowingly ordered two.
customer_reviews.author: Kate C

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and it is nice and thick for him
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old Cavalier who has neck back and patella problems through his life. He loves it and it is nice and thick for him.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Vessey

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product 5 stars but the material sheds from the bed. There is going to be a bald spot soon where my pup lies down. Otherwise, it's a good bed that fits well into the crate and it's very soft.
customer_reviews.author: ggg123

customer_reviews.title: Our GSDs had them destroyed in less than two days ...
customer_reviews.text: Our GSDs had them destroyed in less than two days. If you have a large breed dog, I would suggest something more durable. The size and fit was as described, so I cannot discredit the seller. It was delivered on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft to touch, easily cleaned, has held up...highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the coordinating crate size. Our puppy had accidents on it the first couple nights home, and the cover unzips and washed easily. His "accident" seeped through to the egg crate inside but a little carpet cleaner and some pressure took it right out of the foam. After multiple washes and dries in its first weeks in our home, still silky smooth and awesome texture. The puppy loved the crate right off the bat. I don't take this in and out of the crate and have a separate bed in our living room for him.
customer_reviews.author: EileenPitcock

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality! Straight out of the delivery box, all I did was run my hand through the fur on the cover and it looked like I had brushed a heavily shedding brown dog. It comes out in clumps! Not even worth $10, much less $35!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: The quality is awesome! It was way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The quality is awesome! It was way better than I expected. The fabric is extremely soft, and the padding is extremely thick and comfortable. I would lay on it if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: BMoore

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price, but can not be laundered.
customer_reviews.text: Great beds for the price. The pad is fairly thick for comfort. Have been using it in a crate that one of my dogs sleep in. She had been suffering from hip pain & seems to be better since I started using the bed. The only draw back is that the cover is not removable & therefore can not be washed. I have to put a towel & a blanket over it to keep it clean. This feature seemed a bit silly considering its to be used by a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Elysium Farm

customer_reviews.title: Its thick, soft, and very comfortable. My Irish Terrier 57lbs dog loves it !
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this item and its great quality. My dogs loves sleeping on it. But my new puppy tear it up pretty good. This mat lasted almost a year with proper care. I did place a waterproof cover on top and would regularly washed it, this helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Maricela N Fabian Landeros

customer_reviews.title: Great for 15 yr old
customer_reviews.text: My 16 lb dachshund is 15 years old. I was worried that it would bottom out. It doesn't. She likes it and it's far better for her old bones than the floor.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality / not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves to sleep. She'd had this bed for less than three moths and started balking when it was time to get in her crate. I pulled the bed out and looked at it, it looked ok but felt weird. I opened it and the "material" fell out - it was not a solid mat, it's pieces that are formed together (and did not hold up well for the money). If you're looking for something that provides supports and is durable, this is not the best bed choice.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Low quality foam
customer_reviews.text: The inner foam is made of many "little pieces" of foam stuck together, so when you remove the cover for washing and try to put it back, the foam will come apart in pieces at the slightest effort -- I had to throw the bed out.
customer_reviews.author: Ray F.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Thought an organization like AKC would have a good pet mat. Chose this one for the removable cover. Accidents do happen. But it's all pointless. The promised skid proof back was some sort of cheap paper like fabric and the puppy would jump on it and go sliding around the room. Within 15 minutes the bottom was torn and the foam interior exposed. Then he tried to chew the form. Total disaster. He's back on his original Midwest mat, even though he's much too large for it. Don't waster your time or money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Williams

customer_reviews.title: This ripped through in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: When we received this crate mat, it was the right size and looked nice. However, the cover ripped in less than a month and the foam ripped up as well. We flipped it over and tried to use the other side, but the bottom also ripped within a week. We have a very calm 13 year old lab, and he doesn't dig or move around too much. This ripped just from him walking in and out of his crate. A large crate mat should be made for large dogs and should be durable, but this was worthless and we had to throw it away. Very disappointing and a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: AustinAggie

customer_reviews.title: Cover is soft.  Bed itself?  Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft to the touch and durable but it is a bit on the hard side. I was expecting something that would be a bit less firm. Unless you have a heavier dog it almost feels like your dog is laying on a rock. It is like memory foam a bit but you need some considerable pressure to feel the effects. I'm hoping it softens when it breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: Daratrazanoff5035

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough for even me to lay on. lol. Just not as big as i thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all, not well crafted. Good for a little non- chewer
customer_reviews.text: My dog chewed this up in about ten minutes. It was about as durable as a child’s stuffed animal. Then there was foam stuffing everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Description of item not correct
customer_reviews.text: Item description says machine washable. The card on the item says spot clean only. Returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M. Frescura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cushion to add to an aging recliner. This came up in my search for a "memory foam cushion". Since the dog prefers to be on my lap anyway, it's a win-win situation!
customer_reviews.author: SonRise

customer_reviews.title: Dogs are destructive!!
customer_reviews.text: Probably would have been a nice bed. Sheltie destroyer it the next day. Guess he didn’t B like it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Harn

customer_reviews.title: The dog bed that lived!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a tendency to rip up beds, especially when they have zippers. This one arrived and she loved it immediately, joyfully jumping onto it. It's been over a month now and she hasn't even tried to tear it up - partially because it has foam inside instead of stuffing, and because it has no zippers! It's probably a little annoying to clean if it gets soiled, but so far nothing like that here so I'm a happy camper, and so is my pup!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good, thick
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, thick, cushy (but not too cushy) flat bed. The 30 x 22 fits perfectly in the noz to noz N 30. Perfect meaning that it fits tightly, with no room to spare. The cover is a little thin, but seems to be sturdy enough. My little guy stopped fussing at night once I put this in the krate, even though he had a nice little bed in there before. Now he can spread out and move around a little bit. I am very pleased with this purchase, it fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and it fit her cage perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: One star is pushing it.
customer_reviews.text: Dog tore a hole in it immediately. Decided to patch it with an iron-on patch but the zipper broke on the first unzipping. Decided to sew the hole, but the material wouldn't even hold the thread. Guess you get what you pay for--which in this case should have been nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Use it in a dog kennel and the dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get this if you have big dogs :( we have only had it for a week and it’s as if you threw a fluffy pillow in the wash and it gets all bunched up. And that’s only from my 1 year old lab just laying on it..:( it’s cute and a good thought just not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Lexus Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Fits inside the cage perfect. Dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits inside the cage perfect. Dog seems to like it. I cut a pillow case in half and put it over the mattress. A lot of people complained about top fuzzing off. I have not seen this
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. First one arrived, dog enjoyed the bed, but the underneath of it shredded when i washed it. Amazon replaced it. Went to put it in the kennel, and it ripped as it was going in... no reason why... going to try and sew it up myself, but will NOT ever order another.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Rowe

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price. Very thin cover wears easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK crate pad. It feels really soft and looks nice in the crate, but the cover is exceptionally thin. If your dog doesn't chew through the very thin cover, simple wear and tear from the dog lying on it may very well be enough to wear through the cover to the foam below. At the very least, the felt on top will not last more than a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Can't machine wash
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I loved it until I washed the cover. I used warm/cool water and hung it to dry. It shrank so much, that it won't fit back on. Very frustrating. Don't buy this unless you intend to only spot clean. You would think AKC would be made in USA. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Walker

customer_reviews.title: comfortable for 2 small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, comfortable for 2 small dogs. Should last a long time. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Desert Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice bed for the price. My pup likes to try to chew everything and this thing hasn’t ripped despite her constant attacks. She is 40 pounds and the 36 inch is the perfect size. She has plenty of room to sprawl out!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Love chocolate color and zipper cover is easy to remove but it had holes within weeks. not as durable as my last one.
customer_reviews.author: AMNB

customer_reviews.title: Elder kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My arthritic kitty loves her new bed- it's nice and firm, just like she likes it. She's been spending most of her time on it since Christmas day when I gave it to her. The cover is nice and plush, and even though it says spot clean, I'm sure it will do fine on delicate cycle and air dry. I'm totally happy with this bed because Myrrh loves it. That's what matters most to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my three pups to enjoy, two of them are older and have some arthritis. The bed arrived in a timely fashion and was received as it was described on the site. The fabric is very soft, the foam inside is firm as well. I found the bed to wash easily with some mild detergent and water. My pups immediately begun sleeping on the bed and enjoys it very much
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Z.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Description
customer_reviews.text: I received this less than two weeks ago and it is going in the garbage. IT IS NOT WASHABLE.
customer_reviews.author: Pug_mom

customer_reviews.title: this is so perfect for a crate
customer_reviews.text: this is so perfect for a crate. my older dog is crated and it fits perfect. its soft to the touch and soft for him to lay in but sturdy. ill be buying another one for my other dog here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: The cover was very soft and the memory foam was perfect for my dogs. It worked great...until I had to wash it. Over a couple of washes the cover shrank and the shape warped making it very difficult to fit over the foam. Soon enough, the cover ripped and I had to throw it away! It would be great if the manufacturer made the cover out of a different material and/or place the zipper in a different location (i.e. the seam). Where the zipper is makes it difficult to put the cover back on because you have to fold the foam in 2 and stuff it in. Hence, the tear in mine. Will not be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Faustine Lam

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Boston's sleep crate perfect and she loves it, keeps her up off the floor, warm and happy.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, I'm sure my pup is comfy but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I'm sure my pup is comfy but it is hard to take the cover off to wash and put back on. The zipper should have been made to be longer. This also loses its fuzz fast, so leaves a mess in the crate or your dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: My dog told me she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I believe my dog loves this. Goes in her crate on her own.
customer_reviews.author: twinkiltoes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is in love with this crate mat. She now goes in the crate all by herself to lay on the mat! The mat is super plush and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Pennelope Lee

customer_reviews.title: I understand it was not expensive but I would expect it to hold up better than it has
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in OCT 2015 and already the foam padding is destroyed. My dog hasn't been digging in the bed or chewing. This is just from normal sleeping each night. I understand it was not expensive but I would expect it to hold up better than it has. When it first arrived it seemed like a quality product but has sadly not lived up to that. I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Shredded in no time
customer_reviews.text: It took longer for the order to be fulfilled than for my dog to destroy it. Worthless overpriced garbage made in China. Shame on the Kennel Club if they actually do endorse this.
customer_reviews.author: John O

customer_reviews.title: Wins the gold medal when the dogs pick the winner
customer_reviews.text: Compare this to other orthopedic-style beds and you'll see that it is wayyyyyy less expensive. Given that two of my three dogs are skilled destroyers, it works out perfectly. The outer material is plush and comfy. It also thins out quickly if you have a rooting dog who tries to "rearrange" it every day as if it is a blanket. I have three different bed styles around the house, and this one always gets selected first by the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Still soft
customer_reviews.text: Many foam bed start to loose firmness over time. Had this for months and it is still comfy for my little dog.
customer_reviews.author: IResearchStuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not for puppies or incontinent old dogs
customer_reviews.text: The item is beautiful itself but not easy to clean at all. The inside being made of foam makes it super absorbent. I tried to remove the cover to wash it and the inside completely fell apart, and the urine had soaked into the foam already anyway. Dog must be potry trained.
customer_reviews.author: Leighton Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice Front Seat Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: This has worked as a nice front seat travel bed that I use when traveling with my dog. I use it in my F-150 on the passenger front seat with a backpack on the floor to keep one end up. My 45 pound dog is able to be a lot more comfortable on the long trips, sleep, be relaxed, and I'm very happy with that. Great value, inexpensive... no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Madruga

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second dog bed of this variety. The girls love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

product_meta.title: American Kennel Club Orthopedic Crate Pet Bed
product_meta.description:
Size:Size 36 x 23''| Color:TanFor over a century, the American Kennel Club has led the pack in setting dog standards. Today, we have taken those same high standards in producing our deluxe line of pet products. Memory Foam Pet Mat will allow your pet to lounge in luxury anywhere. Made with memory foam for extra support and comfort.

AKC Wave Fur Memory Foam Pet Mat features



Supportive orthopedic 3 inch mattress
Durable materials
Easy laundry, removable cover, machine wash cold, tumble dry low
Non-skid bottom to prevent sliding on hardwood floors

Risk Free
Money Back Guarantee
Founded in 1884, the American Kennel Club is the recognized and trusted expert in breed, health and training information for dogs. AKC supports thousands of volunteers and teachers across the country who teach responsible dog ownership and safety around dogs; features an education booth that visits more than 40 events a year. AKC actively advocates for responsible dog ownership and is dedicated to advancing dog sports.

Dimensions

Small size 24x19x3'' inch
Medium size 30x22x3'' inch
Large size 36x23x3" inch
Extra Large 42x27x3" icnh
feature_bullets: American Kennel Club Crate Dog Pad Bed is 100% Safe for Animals, Adults & Kids and the environment
Designed to fit most kennels and crates or use this dog orthopedic pad as a stand alone pet bed

Orthopedic Memory foam material supports dogs body, while reducing stress on aching joins and muscles. Perfect for senior dogs, pets with arthritis, hip dysplasia, or other joint, bone or muscle disorders
Extra soft wave fur surface, plushed and breathable. The earth-tone fabric blends with the surrounding decor so your pet can stay comfortable and your home can stay stylish
Non-skid bottom to prevent sliding on hardwood floors. Not designed for dogs with teething behavior. Made with recycled materials
Non-skid bottom to prevent sliding on hardwood floors
Ultra Plush and Supportive orthopedic material
Made from recycled materials and eco-friendly

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
